statements: SELECT * FROM PoliticalDiscussionTrends ORDER BY researcher_name ASC
SELECT researcher_name, social_media_platform FROM PoliticalDiscussionTrends WHERE topic_of_interest='Election'
SELECT researcher_id, researcher_name, analysis_date FROM PoliticalDiscussionTrends WHERE researcher_id=101
SELECT * FROM PoliticalDiscussionTrends WHERE social_media_platform='Twitter' ORDER BY analysis_date DESC
SELECT researcher_name, topic_of_interest, analysis_date FROM PoliticalDiscussionTrends ORDER BY analysis_date ASC

SELECT researcher_id, researcher_name, social_media_platform, topic_of_interest, analysis_date FROM PoliticalDiscussionTrends WHERE social_media_platform = 'Twitter' AND analysis_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY topic_of_interest DESC
SELECT COUNT(researcher_id), social_media_platform FROM PoliticalDiscussionTrends GROUP BY social_media_platform ORDER BY COUNT(researcher_id) DESC
SELECT researcher_id, researcher_name, social_media_platform, topic_of_interest, analysis_date FROM PoliticalDiscussionTrends WHERE topic_of_interest LIKE '%politics%' ORDER BY researcher_name ASC
SELECT researcher_name, social_media_platform FROM PoliticalDiscussionTrends WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY researcher_name, analysis_date DESC
SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(CURRENT_DATE, analysis_date)) AS avg_days_since_analysis FROM PoliticalDiscussionTrends WHERE social_media_platform = 'Facebook' AND topic_of_interest = 'Election'
SELECT * FROM researchers;
SELECT researcher_id, researcher_name FROM researchers ORDER BY researcher_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_posts WHERE post_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT researcher_name FROM researchers WHERE research_area = 'Biology';
SELECT researcher_id, researcher_name, post_content FROM researchers JOIN social_media_posts ON researchers.researcher_id = social_media_posts.researcher_id;
SELECT researcher_name, research_area FROM researchers WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM social_media_posts WHERE researcher_id = 2 ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, post_content FROM researchers JOIN social_media_posts ON researchers.researcher_id = social_media_posts.researcher_id;
SELECT researcher_name, research_area FROM researchers WHERE research_area LIKE '%machine learning%';
SELECT researcher_id, COUNT(post_id) AS num_posts FROM social_media_posts GROUP BY researcher_id HAVING num_posts > 5;
SELECT * FROM researchers
SELECT researcher_name, organization, researcher_id FROM researchers
SELECT discussion_id, topic FROM political_discussions ORDER BY discussion_date DESC
SELECT * FROM social_media WHERE post_id = 1
SELECT post_content FROM social_media ORDER BY post_date ASC
SELECT researcher_name, organization FROM researchers WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT topic, discussion_date FROM political_discussions WHERE discussion_id > 100 ORDER BY discussion_date DESC;
SELECT post_content FROM social_media WHERE LENGTH(post_content) > 100;
SELECT * FROM researchers r JOIN political_discussions pd ON r.researcher_id = pd.discussion_id;
SELECT MAX(post_date) AS latest_post_date FROM social_media;
SELECT * FROM Researchers;
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_email FROM Researchers;
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM SocialMediaPosts;
SELECT analysis_topic, analysis_date FROM TrendAnalysis ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM PoliticalDiscussions WHERE discussion_topic = 'Environment';
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_email FROM Researchers ORDER BY researcher_name DESC;
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE researcher_id = 3;
SELECT researcher_name, analysis_date FROM Researchers JOIN TrendAnalysis ON Researchers.researcher_id = TrendAnalysis.researcher_id WHERE analysis_topic = 'Data Science';
SELECT discussion_topic, discussion_date, post_date FROM PoliticalDiscussions JOIN SocialMediaPosts ON PoliticalDiscussions.post_id = SocialMediaPosts.post_id WHERE post_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT researcher_name, count(*) AS post_count FROM Researchers JOIN SocialMediaPosts ON Researchers.researcher_id = SocialMediaPosts.researcher_id GROUP BY researcher_name HAVING post_count > 5 ORDER BY post_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM researchers;
SELECT researcher_name, research_area FROM researchers;
SELECT * FROM social_media_users WHERE account_created_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM political_posts ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT p.post_content, h.hashtag_name FROM political_posts p JOIN post_hashtags ph ON p.post_id = ph.post_id JOIN hashtags h ON h.hashtag_id = ph.hashtag_id WHERE h.hashtag_name = 'politics';
SELECT * FROM researchers WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT researcher_name FROM researchers WHERE research_area = 'AI';
SELECT user_id, username, account_created_date FROM social_media_users ORDER BY account_created_date DESC;
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM political_posts WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY post_date ASC;
SELECT post_id, hashtag_name FROM post_hashtags INNER JOIN hashtags ON post_hashtags.hashtag_id = hashtags.hashtag_id WHERE hashtag_name = 'technology';
